description: This file sets up a PDF knowledge base with metadata filters, initializes a vector database, and demonstrates querying with filters, specifically for CV documents and user-specific filtering.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF documents with associated metadata.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a vector database interface using pgvector for storing and querying vectors.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base for querying and response generation.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for testing and populates their paths.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads documents into the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response based on a query and filters.
